title: Courgette, pancetta and Gruyere quiche
ingredients: ['1 sheet shortcrust pastry', '1 tablespoon mustard', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '100ml single cream', '1 large courgette, peeled and grated', '200g Gruyere cheese, grated', 'salt and pepper to taste', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '200g pancetta, sliced']
